name: Call-Analyzer (Bearsight.io)
description: A tool that analyzes calls between customer service agents and clients, scoring user experience and call quality using state-of-the-art artificial intelligence. It helps organizations track customer satisfaction and manage the overall quality of support and marketing calls.
role: Researched and developed an end-to-end ML pipeline including audio processing, transcription, speaker diarization, and LLM-based call scoring using configurable domain-specific questions
Built a FastAPI-based product around the machine learning solution
Architected the application with authentication, multi-tenancy support, and analytics-oriented APIs
Developed a queue-based processing mechanism for handling call-analysis requests
Integrated Stripe for user payment and subscription management
